title: Slenderman

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Wait at a player’s house. Any visitors to that player without their eyes closed will be dealt an unstoppable attack

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Upon the start of the game, 8 players will randomly have their house assigned a “page”. You know which houses have your pages.
- A player will collect a page if they visit a player’s house with one as long as they don’t have their eyes closed
- At the start of the game, players will be informed that they may choose to close their eyes when visiting their target(s)
- If a player has their eyes closed, there is a chance their ability targets a random visitor to their target(s), including themselves, instead of their selected target(s)
- You may not be killed or hanged until all 8 pages have been collected. They do not need to be collected by an individual player, just all of them being collected will do.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Protect your 8 pages and kill everyone else

desc:
Post 5307
_“Collect the 8 pages to leave or something yada yada”_
